SelectOutfitName: Write a caption for your outfit
noPasswordRemember: No passwords to remember. We'll send you a unique code to make sure it's you.
spamNote: Allow up to 1 minute to receive it. Remember to check your spam/junk folder.
StartBuildingYourSquad: You're almost done! After this, you'll start building your squad.
YouCanAlwaysChange: Only letters, digits and underscores. You can always change it later.

to interact with each other's wishlist

As soon as @{user} confirms,
you will appear in each other's squad

create_your_squad.description: Add your friends to join your squad. Once they join, you will be able to see and interact with each other’s wishlist.

moderation.text: Seems like your post goes against our guidelines, our moderators will review it. If your post goes against our guidelines, your account maybe suspended.
